synopsis.text: Of humble origins, Maomao, the daughter of an apothecary, finds herself thrust into the opulent world of the emperor's rear palace after being kidnapped and sold as a servant. Despite her unassuming appearance, Maomao possesses an extraordinary knowledge of medicine and a sharp intellect. When the imperial heirs fall mysteriously ill, Maomao seizes the opportunity to put her skills to use, inadvertently catching the eye of the astute head eunuch, Jinshi. Recognizing her talent, Jinshi elevates Maomao's position to a lady-in-waiting for the emperor's favored consort, tasking her with the clandestine duty of tasting the consort's food for poison. As Maomao navigates the intricate web of palace politics and medical mysteries, she must rely on her wit and expertise to unravel the enigmatic ailments that plague the imperial court.
